snippet: The Chiefs’ new brain trust is going right to work, making bold moves to turn around a moribund N.F.L. franchise.
lead_paragraph: The Chiefs’ new brain trust is going right to work, making bold moves to turn around a moribund N.F.L. franchise.

headline.seo: In Kansas City, New Staff Makes Over the Chiefs at Warp Speed
headline.main: Chiefs’ Makeover Moves at Warp Speed
headline.print_headline: Chiefs’ Makeover Moves at Warp Speed
